resources.string:
1. Subscribe to the product well before deadline by clicking on the product name. 

 2. Activate the switch placed next to product you want to book. 

 3. 10 minutes before sale time, a notification will come. Click on that and make sure you are logged in. 

 4. 3 minutes before sale time,if you are not on website or the app is not opened, you will receive another notification. Clicking the same will take you to the product page. If you are on the website, product page will be loaded automatically. 

 5. You will be prompted to choose variant, you want to book. Select one. 

 6. Sit back and relax. It will automatically add the product to your cart when sale goes live.
